alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 15 at 5:02AM CST until December 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...East central Wyoming and the northern Nebraska Panhandle including Lusk, Torrington, Scottsbluff, Alliance, and Chadron. * WHEN...8 AM until 11 PM MST today. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. There will be a high risk for vehicle blow overs, particularly along north to south oriented roadways.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
